alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Henry; Jefferson; Keokuk; Lee; Van Buren; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 5:24AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Henry, southeastern Keokuk, Des Moines, southern Washington, northeastern Van Buren, northeastern Lee, southern Louisa and Jefferson Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 523 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pleasant Plain, or 9 miles northeast of Fairfield, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could break small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burlington, Fairfield, Mount Pleasant, Washington, Wapello, Oquawka, West Burlington, New London, Mediapolis, Winfield, Wayland, Danville, Morning Sun, New Boston, Brighton, Richland, Salem, Middletown, Lockridge and Crawfordsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Stay away from flooded areas. Report any flooding to local law enforecement Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Des Moines; Henry; Jefferson; Keokuk; Lee; Van Buren; Washington
